articles.title: “The first draft is just you telling yourself the story.”
articles.body: You don’t start out writing good stuff. You start out writing crap and thinking it’s good stuff, and then gradually you get better at it. That’s why I say one of the most valuable traits is persistence.

articles.title: You can always edit a bad page
articles.body: You can always edit a bad page. You can’t edit a blank page.

articles.title: Create Apps with No Configuration
articles.body:
Create React App is a new officially supported way to create single-page React applications. It offers a modern build setup with no configuration.

articles.title: Relay: State of the State
articles.body:
This month marks a year since we released Relay and we'd like to share an update on the project and what's next. 
A Year In Review 
A year after launch, we're incredibly excited to see an active community forming around Relay and that companies such as Twitter are using Relay in production:

articles.title: Every secret of a writer’s soul
articles.body: Every secret of a writer’s soul, every experience of his life, every quality of his mind, is written large in his works.
